title: US states seek to ease inflation burden with direct payments - The Associated Press - en Español
content: US states seek to ease inflation burden with direct payments  The Associated Press - en EspañolView Full Coverage on Google News
description: PORTLAND, Maine (AP) — With inflation raging and state coffers flush with cash, governors and lawmakers across the U.S. are considering a relatively simple solution to help ease the pain people are feeling at the gas pump and grocery store — sending money.
